Thanks for the up and welcome to TPB. Do you know and are you able to tell us if this package adds new, or updates existing aircraft? The reason I ask is that I recently reinstalled everything FSX, while keeping my original "Airplanes" folder. After applying the ERJ Vol 2.2 update, I saw that my Volume 1 planes had remained untouched and a whole new selection of the same aircraft had been added instead.

I saw it, tried to reinstall my own product and can't too.
Wrote a message to wilco, but i think it will be diffcult to seed the new code product, cause all news installations wilco's product have a non limitted installation.

Sorry for my english, i'm french and use this language rarely :)

anyone kindly enough to post a rip?
if a rip makes it to TPB, thats all it takes...
come on... please

For now... this baby is f**ked! As long as activation is made through the manufaturer's server, then the birdie is cripped. It will not be long before they all use the CLS B747-200 method of activating... Bottomline, where there is a will there is definitely a way. Peace!
